snippet: Barclays has named Larry Wieseneck as its chief strategy officer for corporate and investment banking, a newly created role, according to an internal memorandum. He will be succeeded by John Langley and Joe McGrath.
abstract: Barclays has named Larry Wieseneck as its chief strategy officer for corporate and investment banking, a newly created role, according to an internal memorandum. He will be succeeded by John Langley and Joe McGrath.

byline.original: By MICHAEL J. DE LA MERCED

headline.main: Barclays Names Chief Strategy Officer and New Heads of Global Finance
